name: uMine 1.3

Minecraft's Unity3D Version

Developed in 12 Hours

Controls:

Movement : W A S D

Cube Breaking : Left Mouse

 Build Cube : Right Mouse

Select Cubes : 1-7

Down : Left SHIFT

Run : Left CTRL

Cheats:

/gamemode 1 - Creative Mode /gamemode 0 - Survival Mode

/At0m - Surprise for At0m

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/gridbox-prototype-ma...
